title: What is a personal insight of scientific study? - Quora

response.answer_text: An insight that is especially personal or (one thinks, for educational purposes) unique to one's thought qua practicing scientist. For example, if I thought I was the first to develop exponential efficiency into a fundamental mechanics impacting society, I might write: “It may be that our society as it stands, is ironically not yet exponential enough in some way. Which way this is will change, and only me, and those that follow and learn from me, and their intellectual forebears could tell. If this prophecy is untrue I shudder at what history will hold.”
